title: Private and Group Lessons
intro: Every lesson is personalized, but there’s always a clear structure so you know what to expect and how you’ll grow.

blocks.heading: First Session — Diagnostic & Roadmap
blocks.body: We discuss your goals, check your English level, and design a personalized learning plan. You leave with a clear picture of how we’ll move forward.

blocks.heading: Ongoing Sessions — Simple, Focused Flow
blocks.body: Each 50-minute session follows a repeatable pattern so it feels natural and productive.
steps: Focused practice (30 min): roleplay, conversation, or skills (e.g., meetings, interviews, travel)

blocks.heading: Milestone Check-Ins (every 10 sessions)
blocks.body: We pause to review progress, reset goals, and design your next stage of learning.

blocks.heading: Post-Session Summary
blocks.body: After each lesson, you receive key phrases, corrections, and next steps so you can keep learning between sessions.

groups.title: Group Sessions
groups.blurb: A fun, community-style format focused on speaking time and real-world topics. Great for momentum and accountability.
bullets: Topic tracks like Business English, Travel, or Culture Club
Guided activities and pair work for maximum speaking time
Light homework to build continuity between sessions
Designed to feel welcoming for mixed levels
